text: idi (i upavasam) nirnayincabadina rojulaku matrame. Kani, milo evaraina vyadhigrastulai unte, leka prayananlo unte, vere dinalalo (a upavasalu) purti ceyali. Kani danini purti ceyatam durbharamaina varu pariharanga, oka pedavaniki bhojanam pettali. Kani evaraina sahrdayanto inka ekkuva melu ceyadaliste, adi atani meluke! Kani miru telusuko galigite upavasam undatame, miku ento uttamamainadi
